lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth may be sitting proudly at the top of the world rankings but the American believes his short game needs plenty of work before he can regain the mantle of the hottest player in golf.

headline.print_headline: Spieth Hoping to Wield Hot Putter in Tropical Singapore
headline.main: Spieth Hoping to Wield Hot Putter in Tropical Singapore

snippet: Jordan Spieth may be sitting proudly at the top of the world rankings but the American believes his short game needs plenty of work before he can regain the mantle of the hottest player in golf....
